title: JBL Flip 2 Wireless Speaker Overview
description:
JBL Flip 2 Wireless Speaker - http://www.abt.com/resources/pages/search.php?keywords=jbl+flip+2
Shop All Portable & Bluetooth Speakers - http://www.abt.com/category/358/Portable-Bluetooth-Speakers.html

Key Features:
• Bluetooth Connectivity
Allows you to wirelessly stream music through any Bluetooth enabled device.
JBL Flip 2 - Portable Bluetooth speaker with advanced speakerphone
• Built-in Microphone
The built-in microphone allows you to answer calls without skipping a beat.
JBL Flip 2 - Portable Bluetooth speaker with advanced speakerphone
• Rechargeable Battery
Features a rechargeable battery for convenient portability and extended playback time.
• Aux Connection
Auxiliary-input (aux in) connector allows you to plug into practically any audio device.
Features:
• Cutting-edge drivers and a built-in bass port.
• Dual 40 mm drivers and a custom tuned built-in bass port for faithful sound reproduction so you never miss a word in your favorite music no matter what volume you play your music.
• SoundClear echo and noise cancellation and customized microphone.
• SoundClear echo and noise cancellation technologies and a built-in customized microphone further reduce background noise and distortion so your phone calls come through crisp and clear on the Flip 2 at any volume.
• Bluetooth wireless streaming and connectivity to all smartphones and tablets
• Stream music from any portable smart devices to the Flip 2 its that simple. With easy Bluetooth set up thanks to NFC and stable Bluetooth connection the Flip 2 serves all your portable music needs.
• Signature JBL Flip design for portability that fits in your hand.
• The JBL Flip 2 features the same shape you know from Flip 1. In multiple colors and enhanced material and finishing the JBL Flip 2 is an upgrade from the original in performance and style.
